entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 March 2023
